branchCategory.name: LVP, Vinyl Chloride Air Operated Valve
branchCategory.description: Series LVP, employs vinyl chloride CPVC for body material.  With its 2 ports, piping is possible in four directions.  Applicable fluids, deionized water and chemicals.
